alert.note: Alert for Allegany; Cattaraugus; Chautauqua; Genesee; Livingston; Monroe; Orleans; Southern Erie; Wyoming (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 17 at 3:48PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A line of showers with gusty winds will impact portions of Wyoming, Cattaraugus, southeastern Erie, western Livingston, eastern Orleans, southeastern Chautauqua, western Allegany, Monroe and Genesee Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 345 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking showers along a line extending from Pembroke to 12 miles southwest of Gowanda. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rochester, Greece, Irondequoit, Chili, Batavia, Olean, Brockport, Geneseo, Hilton, Salamanca, Brighton, Gates-North Gates, Hamlin Beach State Park, Allegany State Park, Darien Lakes State Park, Letchworth State Park, Henrietta, Le Roy, Springville and Perry. This includes the following highways... Interstate 390 between exits 7 and 12. Interstate 90 between exits 46 and 48. Interstate 86 between exits 16 and 30. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Allegany; Cattaraugus; Chautauqua; Genesee; Livingston; Monroe; Orleans; Southern Erie; Wyoming
